title: Interpretation of feces in a dream for a married woman and seeing a child’s feces in a dream for a married woman according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of feces in a dream for a married woman: Feces in a dream come to symbolize many meanings, whether praiseworthy or not, like all dreams, and although after this vision one feels a state of disgust, anxiety, and confusion, scholars have differed regarding its meanings, which differed depending on the social situation. And the psychological state and the place where the fortuneteller saw the feces. Below are the most important interpretations of seeing feces in a married woman’s dream. Interpretation of feces in a dream by Ibn Sirin for a married woman. What is the interpretation of feces in a dream for a married woman? When interpreting the vision of feces in a dream for a married woman, some scholars tended to indicate that it is a vision Good, because it is a sign of relief from distress, the removal of adversity, and the ease of circumstances, or it may indicate that the dreamer is a loyal friend and confidant of secrets. As for Imam Al-Sadiq, he said about the contamination of clothes with feces: It is a bad sign for the accumulation of worries, a large number of sins, and the work of abomination, and the dream comes as a warning of the necessity of this. . Return to God and ask for sincere repentance. If a woman collects feces during the dream, this is an indication that she is making a lot of profits from a corrupt trade, while a dream about walking on feces indicates entering suspicious places or prohibited businesses. If the woman is rich and sees some of her excrement on Her clothes, this is an ugly sign of the loss of her money. If feces come out of the mouth, it symbolizes backbiting, gossiping, and disorder, or an expression of a lot of false conversations. If the partner is sick, this dream may indicate recovery from any disease. Diarrhea indicates tolerance, tolerance, and forgiving people. It can indicate an excess of money, especially if the dreamer is wealthy in reality. If a woman is unable to defecate, this is a sign of contentment and acceptance of what God has given her. Dreaming of defecating with difficulty is evidence of stinginess, or a sign of hatred and malice, and sometimes it means that you are passing With extreme distress and difficult circumstances at the present time, if the dreamer cannot get rid of them. Interpretation of feces in a dream by Ibn Sirin: For a married woman, seeing feces with a moldy smell in a dream means that you will obtain a lot of money through illegal means. In the case of defecation in the marital bed, it is evidence of her dislike of Going through a health condition that destroys the entire body, which requires her to spend this period in bed. This dream has another interpretation, because it symbolizes many disputes that arise between the woman and her husband and a lack of happiness with him, and this leads to divorce. The process of defecation in general means escaping from sin. Great and disobedient committed by the woman of the vision. Anyone who has a plan to travel abroad and sees herself defecating a lot, then this is an unfavorable sign of stopping the trip and not filling out the papers and documents required for it. If the woman suffers from health disorders, especially in her digestive system, and she sees a dream about feces, then this Good news for her recovery and health, but if she is worried or going through a financial crisis, the dream indicates the end. Distress and debt coming due soon. A married woman may appear in a dream indicating that she is getting married

title: What is the interpretation of a pregnant woman’s dream of seeing a king in a dream?

preview.html: One of the praiseworthy visions that carry signs is the king’s vision of a pregnant woman in a dream, and some scholars interpret the vision of the accused or the rulers in dreams as good news for the woman with the vision that opens the doors of livelihood and high status, and this is God. She will give her good offspring well-thought-out unpleasant visions of the problems she faces in her life. Commentators believe that the interpretation of a pregnant woman’s vision of the king varies depending on the psychological state of the woman, and we will discuss in detail in this article everything related to seeing the king in a dream for a pregnant woman. Interpretation of the king in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The sheikh of translators, Ibn Sirin, gives us the interpretation of seeing the king in a dream for a pregnant woman. King in a dream, it means success in defeating and overcoming enemies. Ibn Sirin believes that seeing kings in good condition is an indication that the dreamer’s circumstances are improving and that God will amend and stabilize them in the future. Scholars interpret seeing the king as one of the indications that the dreamer will rise in Position and gains some authority or promotion at work or becomes an influential person. Commentators also characterized the vision of a king of Arab origin, this is a warning that the woman will suffer from serious injustice and it is possible that a person will oppress her rights. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a king in a dream for a pregnant womanIf the pregnant woman sees that she She is talking to the king, then this is news for her that she will have many children. If a pregnant woman dreams that she is talking to the king, this is one of the signs that indicates the ease of her pregnancy and that it is possible that God will bless her with a beautiful, good-natured and beautiful woman. If the dreamer is talking with the king on a date She is a person and a sign that the time of birth is approaching, and also that she will go through a quiet phase and her child will come without anything. Diseases mean health, and God knows best. One of the promising visions for giving birth to a child is a dispute with the king in a dream about a pregnant woman. As for a pregnant woman who sees the head in her dream, it is a sign of a lot of nourishment in life and that she will receive her child in the very near future. Interpretation of the king’s handshake for a pregnant woman In a dream: A woman who shakes hands with the king in her dream while she is pregnant is good news for overcoming the difficulties of pregnancy. Shaking hands with kings in a dream for a pregnant woman is a sign of superiority in position and work, if she is working or studying. Interpretation of a dream about marrying a king for a pregnant woman: A vision of marrying a king is interpreted as A very clear indication to the dreamer that she will live a completely different life and that her situation will change overnight. God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about the king addressing his people for a pregnant woman: If a pregnant woman dreams that the king is preaching to his people, this is good news that her child will be in good health after the birth period. Interpretation of seeing the king shaking hands with the pregnant wife. Seeing the condition of the dreamer’s husband of the king or president in her dream is a well-interpreted vision and indicates that this The husband will go through a life of poverty and immediately enjoy an abundance of sustenance and blessings and God will compensate him for that. Serious inconvenience in his work.For a different dream interpretation, you can use the Live Dream Interpretation application.

title: Interpretation of seeing a dollar in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a dollar in a dream Seeing a dollar in a dream generally indicates the abundant luck that the dreamer enjoys and the blessing of success in various areas of his real life. This shows that a dollar in a dream is a symbol of happiness, in which money has the largest share. It tells the dreamer what good news that can He receives it, which will have a positive impact on his psyche in the coming season, God willing. Seeing a fake dollar in a dream indicates that the viewer is surrounded by people who treat him deceitfully, hate him, and want to manipulate him. If one sees that he is carrying paper dollars, this indicates an improvement in the financial conditions that the viewer enjoys, What he also has is wisdom and good management of affairs. A married man promises that he will have a beautiful and beautiful child. The boxes are full of dollars. The fortuneteller portends obtaining a lot of money through his inheritance from one of his relatives. It indicates that there are many desires in the dreamer’s life that are not fulfilled, so he should To strive and persevere to achieve those desires. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a dollar in a single woman’s dream: Seeing a new dollar in one dream, tell her how lucky she will be to find a new job and improve her financial situation. This heralds her great success in the tests she will undergo, whether in the field of study or in accepting a prestigious job. Seeing a dollar in an unmarried woman’s dream indicates the possibility of her traveling abroad to work and getting money because of that. I have a vision of a free girl, for many dollars and in large quantities, it is interpreted as the dreamer’s longevity, but if she sees herself stealing dollars, it shows problems and judgments. Which she will receive in the next period of her life. Giving her dollars in a dream to a stranger suggests what is affected in real life by her urgent need for security and containment. Unrelated vision: In the dream in which she found dollars, this indicates that she has a distinctive personality with confidence and strength that helps her face life. Interpretation of seeing a dollar in a dream for a married woman: Seeing a dollar in a married woman’s dream indicates that she has a strong personality capable of dealing with crises and good behavior in her real life. This is explained by the possibility of traveling outside the country, which she has always been looking forward to working in one of the prestigious jobs, which will improve her financial situation. And for her family in the near future, God willing. And if she sees in a dream that she is receiving dollars from one of her relatives, this indicates that she will accumulate material benefits, abundance in food, and abundance in nourishment. It is also said that it will be good news for married people, but if she is not pregnant, then she is pregnant by her husband, and she will have offspring. Valid, God willing, and the baby will be male when she sees ten dollar bills, and female if the bills are of individual denominations. Seeing a married woman carrying a box with a large amount of dollars indicates the extent of her strong relationship with her Lord, and her constant desire to obey Him, which will be a reason for her to obtain goodness and abundance. It also indicates that her living conditions are stable and that she is getting a period

title: Interpretation of a dream about henna on the hand of a married woman in the great imams 2021

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about henna on the hands of a married woman. Henna is an herb used for the hair and skin as it strengthens the hair and increases its beauty. A woman may sometimes dream of applying henna on her hand and is looking for an interpretation of this dream. Today and until today, various, we will talk about the interpretation of a dream about henna on the hands of a married, unmarried and pregnant woman, and what are the interpretations of this dream for adults. Scholars. Interpretation of a dream about henna on the hand of a married woman, according to Ibn Sirin: The scholar Ibn Sirin interpreted henna on the hair as a covering, a sign of happiness, peace of mind, and a sign of the end of problems and worries. The scholar Ibn Sirin interpreted his vision of applying henna on the head as evidence of committing forbidden things and staying away from God Almighty. The scholar Ibn Sirin also interpreted seeing henna applied to the hands and feet in a dream as meaning joy. However, if a girl dreams that she is putting henna on her fingers, this indicates her adherence to the teachings of religion and the frequent remembrance of God Almighty. Also, seeing henna in a dream can be a warning and warning. To return to God, if the person who dreams is the person who commits sins and disobedience. However, if one dreams of henna, it may indicate that the dreamer is a generous person and performs charitable, good, and benevolent deeds secretly and publicly, and it may also be a sign of happy events and positive changes in material and financial matters. Level. The scholar Ibn Sirin also interpreted seeing henna in the hair as evidence of strength and immunity and an indication of happiness, joy, pleasure, generosity, generosity and blessing. The scholar Ibn Sirin explained that seeing henna on the right hand is good, and seeing it on the left is bad, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about henna for a man: If If a man dreams of henna in a dream, this indicates fraud in sales and deception in it, and he also interprets it to improve the dreamer’s life. If a man dreams of applying henna on his head, this indicates good news and almost relief. Interpretation of a dream about henna by Ibn Shaheen: The scholar Ibn Shaheen interpreted seeing henna in a dream as follows: It is good, good news, benefit, abundance, and wealth for the dreamer, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about henna by Imam Al-Sadiq: The honest cloud interpreted seeing henna in a dream for an unmarried girl as a sign of her imminent marriage, but if the sick person dreams of it, this indicates his recovery. From his illness. It indicates the integrity of his religion. In an enlightened way, Imam Al-Sadiq explained that it is a sign of joy and a solution to problems and worries, and he almost relieved her, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about henna by Al-Nabulsi: Al-Nabulsi interpreted henna with a slightly different interpretation, as it is a symbol of adornment, so he interpreted it on the basis of the verse: Money and children are the adornment of this worldly life, so consider this The dream means money and children, and it has also been interpreted as a person’s readiness to perform his duties, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about henna on the hand of a married woman: If a woman dreams that she is putting henna on her hand, this indicates good news and that she will receive news that will make her happy. Also, seeing a woman covering her entire body with henna in a way Beautiful and harmonious, it shows her happiness and stability in her married life. However, if a woman dreams that she is putting henna on her feet, this indicates the arrival of a source of livelihood or closeness to marriage.

Interpretation of the dream of henna on the hand of a married woman: If a woman dreams that she is putting henna on her hand, this indicates good news and that she will receive news that makes her happy. title: A detailed interpretation of a palace in a dream

preview.html: Here in this article, the interpretation of the palace in a dream for different occasions. It is known that the palace is the residence of presidents, kings and the rich. The most important thing that distinguishes palaces is their vast area and luxury. What does seeing them in a dream mean? It leads to a good omen or a bad omen. Therefore, the scholars of interpretation gave different meanings to interpret and explain these dreams. Through the following lines of the encyclopedia, we will learn in detail about the interpretation of the dream in the palace. Interpretation of the palace in a dream Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing the palace in a dream The dream jurist Ibn Sirin says that the palace in a dream generally symbolizes power, influence and high status. One of the auspicious dreams is the dream of seeing the palace from afar, because it means that God Almighty will achieve everything he wants and change his circumstances for the better, and if the dreamer is in debt, this means that he will be able to. He pays off all his debts. If a person sees in a dream that he has a palace, his dreams indicate that God Almighty will grant him good luck and a lot of money that will make him rich. Whoever sees in his dream that he has entered a palace that belongs to someone else, this indicates that the dreamer will receive a benefit from someone close to him. Seeing a palace built of clay in a dream means that the dreamer will enjoy his money and blessings and God will grant him abundant sustenance. Dreaming of the palaces of heaven is good news for the dreamer to achieve the goals he seeks and his victory over his enemies. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a palace for a single woman One of the well-interpreted visions for an unmarried woman is her dream of a beautiful palace, because it means that she will soon hear happy news that she has been waiting for for a while. If an unmarried woman sees a large palace in her dream, her dream indicates that she will marry a person of good morals and is distinguished by wealth and generosity. Whoever sees a royal palace in her dream, this indicates that she has succeeded in her studies and that God will grant her the appropriate job. An unmarried woman who dreams of sleeping in a palace indicates that she will marry a righteous man It makes her happy. An unmarried woman trying to enter the palace in a dream is good news that she will marry someone with whom she will enjoy happiness and love in her life. Owning a large palace in a dream indicates that he will succeed in something he seeks. Interpretation of the palace in a dream for a married woman If a married woman sees a beautiful and elegant palace in her dream, the dream indicates that she will enjoy happiness and stability in her married life. Whoever sees a large palace in her dream, her dreams show that her husband has all the respect and attention for her. The white palace in a married woman’s dream indicates her husband’s love for her and that God will bless her with righteous children who honor her. As for the abandoned palace in a married woman’s dream, it is a terrible dream, because it means that there are jealous and spiteful people in the dreamer’s life. If a married woman dreams that she is entering the palace, the dream here is good news that she will become pregnant. A palace in a dream for a pregnant woman A pregnant woman’s dream of a palace indicates that God Almighty will grant her a male child, and he will enjoy a high position among people in his life. One of the well-interpreted dreams of a pregnant woman is her dream of

If If a married woman dreams that she is entering a palace, then the dream here is good news that she will become pregnant. A palace in a dream for a pregnant woman. A pregnant woman’s dream of a palace indicates that God Almighty will give her a male child, and in his life he will enjoy a high status among the people. title: Does incomplete washing in a dream according to Ibn Sirin mean good or bad?

preview.html: Interpretation of incomplete ablution in a dream: In this article, we present to you the interpretation of incomplete ablution in a dream in detail that prayer is one of the five pillars of Islam, and it is not permissible for anyone to convert to Islam except by performing it, as God Almighty has commanded it for every sane adult Muslim. That is, dream interpretation scholars have clarified the interpretation of a dream after completing ablution for unmarried, married, and pregnant women, which we will refer to in the following lines in the encyclopedia.Interpretation of a dream of not completing ablutionAblution in a dream generally symbolizes a change in the dreamer’s situation and life for the better, giving him comfort and happiness. If the dreamer suffers from debts and sees in his dream that he is performing ablution; This means the end of his debts and salvation from them. But if the dreamer is single, then the vision is good news about his marriage, and if he is worried, this is a sign that his worries will disappear and he will obtain a lot of goodness. But if one dreams that he cannot perform ablution. This means that he will stop implementing a decision he had previously made, whether it was related to marriage or work. This dream also indicates the dreamer’s weakness, negativity, and irresponsibility, and thus not achieving anything in his life. Another interpretation of this dream is the dreamer’s lack of interest in performing his duties toward his religion or His family or his work. I dreamed that I was washing and did not finish washing. Whoever sees in his dream that he is performing ablution, but his ablution is not complete. This dream indicates that his goals have not been achieved as a result of the difficulties he faces. Incomplete washing in the dream indicates that the dreamer will suffer from worries that are bothering him in his life. This dream also shows the dreamer’s inability to pay his debts or his efforts in not doing something that will displease God. If A person dreamed that he could not perform ablution, but he resumed it. The dream shows the dreamer's ability to overcome obstacles and reach his goals. Whoever sees in his dream that he is performing ablution does not complete it. This dream indicates the loss of a loved person or thing. It is possible that this dream indicates that the dreamer is facing major problems at work. One of the dreams that is foreshadowing is the dream of washing with hot water and then not being able to finish the wash. This vision shows that there is someone who hates the dreamer, hates him, and seeks to harm him. This dream may portend that something bad will happen to its owner, which may be leaving his job or suffering from an illness. Incomplete ablution in a dream for an unmarried woman. If an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she is performing ablution and it is not completed. Her ablution. Her vision showed her failure to perform worship. A single woman’s dream of washing her bed and not being able to finish washing it indicates the loss of a member of her family. One of the warning visions is seeing an unmarried woman washing in a public market and not completing her washing. This vision indicates that there are those who speak ill of her to harm her reputation. Whoever sees in her dream that she has not completed her ablution and religious commitment. This vision showed that he paid some of those debts. But if the flag was striped; Seeing her not completing her ablution in a dream means canceling her engagement. When an unmarried woman dreams that her ablution is not complete and she is trying to travel. This means that her journey will take place. This dream can also symbolize

title: Interpretation of seeing cigarettes in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing cigarettes in a dream by Ibn Sirin, Nabulsi, Ibn Shaheen, Ibn Kathir, and Imam Sadiq. Scientists and jurists interpreted dreams and visions through the website Vision roy2a.com, as seeing cigarettes smoked in a dream is one of the worst habits. It is dangerous to human health, so we will talk about the interpretation of this dream for a single girl, a married pregnant woman, a man, a young man, and a divorced woman. What is the interpretation of seeing smoking cigarettes in a dream for a single girl? Seeing a single girl smoking cigarettes in a dream is an indication of the formation of many bad relationships that will help her follow vice and desires and try Completely destroying her life. Seeing a single girl lighting cigarettes and feeling happy is an indication of her serious psychological crisis and bringing her harm and harm. Seeing single people smoking cigarettes and feeling angry is evidence of goodness and happiness for her and her return to repentance and extremist religion and abandoning sins. See also: Interpretation of seeing smoking cigarettes in a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing a woman A married woman smoking cigarettes in a dream? Seeing a married woman smoking cigarettes in a dream is a sign of her major disagreements with her husband and children and bringing evil and harm to her entire family. Seeing a married woman smoking a lot in a dream is an indication of her feeling unwell, her extreme sadness, her exposure to injustice from those close to her, and her attempt to appear innocent in order to She lives happily and safely and changes her life for the better. What is the interpretation of seeing a man smoking cigarettes in a dream? Seeing a man smoking cigarettes in a dream is indicative of obtaining an important position and a major promotion in the country, achieving the greatest ambitions and great successes, and increasing halal money. Seeing a man smoking with great sadness indicates walking in an unfamiliar way and being forced to Smoking is a sign of his salvation from calamities and misfortunes. Seeing people smoking a lot in a dream is an indication of the spread of injustice and corruption among people. See also: Interpretation of seeing smoking for non-smokers in a dream. What is the interpretation of a pregnant woman seeing cigarettes in a dream? Seeing a pregnant woman smoking cigarettes in a dream is an indication of her many problems. With her husband, which may lead to divorce. Seeing a pregnant woman smoking cigarettes is a frequent indication of the severity of the disease during pregnancy and childbirth. Seeing a pregnant woman smoking with great sadness and sadness is a sign of joy and happiness with the arrival of the new baby. What is the interpretation of seeing a young man smoking cigarettes in a dream? Seeing a young man smoking cigarettes in a dream is a sign of His separation from his fiancée due to the many emotional problems between them and his attempt to solve them again. Seeing burning and extinguished cigarettes in a dream indicates his negligence in work and lack of diligence in his work. Seeing smoking a lot in a dream is a sign that he lost all his money and was exposed to a serious health crisis. Seeing smoking is very sad. A sign of his exit. From all misfortunes and crises. See compulsive smoking as an indication that you bring goodness and abundance and follow the straight path. See also: Interpretation of seeing cannabis in a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing yourself extinguishing a cigarette in a dream? Dreaming of extinguishing a cigarette is an indication that he will bear great responsibilities and solve his problems. Seeing a single girl extinguishing a cigarette in A dream is a sign of the dream

title: Interpretation of nerve pain in a dream - seeing a nerve in a dream

preview.html: Nerve in a dream, interpretation of dreams, meaning of a dream by Ibn Sirin, interpretation of nerves in a dream for a pregnant woman, nerve. Interpretation of nerve in a dream. Nerve in a dream is the author of the human system, and whoever finds pain in his nerves becomes distressed and sad, and the decrease or increase in what appears is reinterpreted.Interpretation of nerve pain In a dream, someone who finds pain in his nerves will experience grief and sadness, and if his nerves are cut, his condition will be destroyed, and if he is sick, his life will be exhausted. title: What is the interpretation of seeing lice in a dream?

preview.html: But what are the signs that lice carry in a dream, which is white and different from black, and we will answer the previous questions in the following lines, so follow us through our translator’s website. What is the interpretation of seeing lice in a dream? Imam Ibn Sirin says that a lot of lice in a dream indicates weak people who do not They have no strength or help. Single lice in a dream indicate a weak person, whether an enemy or a friend. Seeing a limited number of lice in a dream means raising children and treating them gently. A louse bite in a dream means that the dreamer will suffer minor damage that he will not suffer from for long, and God knows best. Seeing large lice in a dream represents torment and suffering, while small lice indicate illness, anxiety, and imprisonment. Seeing swarms of lice in a dream is an increase in money. Sheikh Al-Nabulsi says that an increase in the number of lice in a ruler’s dream indicates the army or ministers. In a teacher’s dream, large numbers symbolize From lice to students and students. Seeing lice also indicates gossip, gossip, and a person characterized by malice and spite. Lice in a dream symbolizes slander that incites relatives against each other. A louse bite in a dream represents the enemy who distorts the image and reputation of the fortuneteller and speaks about him with malice and lies. And seeing white lice In a dream, it is good news about the death of worry, anxiety, and problems. See also: Interpretation of a dream about hair lice for a single woman. Interpretation of seeing lice in hair in a dream by Ibn Sirin. According to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation, seeing a lot of lice in the hair. Evidence that the fortuneteller is afflicted with an incurable disease that will last for a long time. He feels an itch in his head asking for money from others. Seeing lice walking on the head in a dream indicates the presence of a large number of negative thoughts circulating in the dreamer’s mind. Whoever feels lice in his hair has many bad thoughts about others, and his thoughts are always contrary to the teachings of religion. Seeing lice in his hair A woman's hair in a dream is a sign of revealing her bad thoughts. Seeing lice in a man's hair is a sign that he has committed many sins. Seeing lice in a dead person's hair is evidence of bad talk about him. Seeing lice on the scalp in a dream is evidence of the presence of a person from the family. The dreamer does not respect him and always insults him in front of others. Lice falling from the hair to the clothes in a dream is considered good news for a promotion and a financial reward at work. Interpretation of seeing lice on the body by Ibn Sirin. Seeing lice on the body in a dream represents a life of luxury, luxury, and a lot of wasting money. And whoever sees lice walking On a corpse in a dream speaks of lies and perjury. Ibn Sirin says that a large louse in a dream is a sign of the shortness of the dreamer’s life, and that if it were only a louse. A large number of lice on the body indicates illness and pain, and God knows best. Seeing lice flying from the body in a dream, It means the escape of the son. Whoever removes lice from his body in a dream has the right to leave one of his workers or servants, and God knows best. It is said that cleansing the body of lice in a dream is evidence of many blessings and God’s gratitude for them. Seeing lice sucking blood from the body in a dream is a sign of an enemy. Weak: The dreamer is safe from his evil and can overcome

title: Interpretation of a dream about my husband having a big belly in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about my husband having a big stomach in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about my husband having a big stomach in a dream. If a woman sees that her husband has a big stomach in a dream, this may be a sign of many fears and problems that the husband faces at that time. A dream about a husband with a big stomach can be a sign However, he is suffering from a major problem that will appear to him in those days. If the husband sees that he has a large stomach in a dream, this may indicate the inability to achieve desires and dreams in those days, and God knows best. Seeing a husband with a large stomach in a dream may mean that he will get a lot of Money and a large allowance in those days, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about a husband hitting his wife in front of his family in a dream. If a woman sees her husband hitting her in front of his family, this may indicate his great love for her at that time. A husband hitting his wife in a dream may be a sign of the good relationship that exists between them. . And God knows best. If a woman sees her husband beating her in front of his family in a dream, this may indicate changes in their lives during this time. And God knows best. A dream about a husband beating his wife in front of his family in a dream may indicate material gains and many good things that will come to them in those days by God’s grace. Interpretation of seeing my husband holding my hand in a dream If a woman sees that her husband was holding her hands in a dream, this may indicate A happy married life during that period, thanks to God. Dreaming of a husband holding a woman’s hand in a dream may indicate good changes that will occur in their lives during this period. Anyone who sees in her dream that her husband was holding her hands may indicate positive changes that will occur in their lives during that period. Seeing a husband holding a woman’s hand in a dream may indicate happy events that will happen to them on those days, and God knows best. Seeing a husband holding his wife’s hand in a dream may mean that he has overcome enemies or happy events that come his way on those days, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about a husband defending his wife in a dream: If a woman sees that her husband was defending her in a dream, this may indicate protecting him from any harm or evil that he may face during those days. A dream about a husband defending his wife in front of his family in a dream may indicate emerging from a serious experience Or a problem that he suffers from in those days. If a woman sees her husband defending her, this indicates that he will protect her from any harm that she may be exposed to from those around her in those days, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about my husband kissing my feet in a dream: If a woman dreams that her husband is kissing her feet, This may indicate the intense love that existed between them at that time, thanks to God. Dreaming of a husband kissing his wife’s feet in a dream may indicate the marital bliss they were enjoying at that time, and God knows best. If a woman dreams that her husband kisses her feet, this may indicate This is due to the abundant livelihood and abundance that you will obtain in those days. If you dream that you are kissing your husband’s feet in a dream, this may be an indication of the end of the worries and pains that they suffered from a long time ago, and God knows best. Interpretation of the vision
